title: Looking for players for a serious ranked team (Trying to go to Oceanic Challenger Series).
body:
Hey guys, we are The Knights, a starting/building e-Sports team, hoping to go to the Oceanic Challenger Series. Before I go into detail about the positions and such, we are looking for dedicated and serious members - people with the same passion as me to go to OCS, or even opL if we're really good. You need to be able and willing to participate in weekend training sessions, team chats, and creation of League plays. Basically, you need to have tons of time on the weekend (just a couple of hours in the early stages) to be willing to do some team training. You should also be able to play pro picks. Additionally, you will need to have:

Skype
At least Level 30 (for the ranked team)
Willingness to train and improve
YOU MUST BE WILLING TO PLAY SATURDAY AND SUNDAY GAMES AND MEET ON TIME. IF YOU DO NOT ATTEND THREE WITHOUT A VALID REASON, YOU'RE OUT. WE ARE A SERIOUS TEAM LOOKING FOR SERIOUS COMPETITIVE PLAY. TRAINING SESSIONS INCLUDED.
A calm head - you must not get mad at your teammates
Time
Skill (this can always improve) and flexibility with champions at your main role
Our current and developing team roster is:

Coach: LGC Minkywhale. I'm not kidding. I got into contact with him, and he'll be happy to coach us. Awesome, eh? (Challenger 1, obviously)

Substitute Coach: Saiclone (Analyst for the Dire Wolves opL team, they came third). Again awesome, eh? (Diamond IV, but he'll be able to teach us professional Oceanic League play)

Top: Cloudy Days (Diamond V)
Mid: IN NEED (DESPERATE)
Jungle: IN NEED (DESPERATE)
Support: AnonymousDiamond - That's me :). (Silver III - I know, not the best but I'm looking to play tons over the week. I am getting lots of tutoring)
ADC: Sun Wubong (Diamond V)

Substitute 1 ADC/Support: IN NEED
Substitute 2 Mid: Ziggy Fate (Diamond V, played in a team with players who eventually made it to opL)
Substitute 3 Top: IN NEED
Substitute 4 Jungle: IN NEED

Put your application in the comments, according to this little draft:

Summoner ID:
Rank (We will review your account to see if you are quite good even if you're at a low rank, but higher ranks will have higher chance):
Hours which can be played over the weekends:
Age (Doesn't matter a single ounce, but you can't be 11 and play for us, 13+ is good):
Skype:
First Name:
Preferred Role:
Champions Played In Said Role:
How can I trust you to be dedicated:

Good luck on the battle field, summoners! 

I will attempt to reply to every post - do not expect an instant reply. I have to review all summoners first, and make a choice!  YOU MUST LEAVE AN APPLICATION. I WILL DENY ALL REQUESTS SENT VIA "ADD FRIEND" ON LEAGUE OF LEGENDS.

replies.body: Just letting you know that you must be 17+ to play in OPL

Mhmm, but what are the chances of us making it to opL anyways? We're just a startup, we're not the Chiefs hiring or anything like that. That being said however, our team is pretty much 17+ so if a miracle occurs, we're all set :)
Abit rude i mean everyone can try for the challenger series that why riot put it in place

Summoner ID: Hiimjames001
Rank (We will review your account to see if you are quite good even if you're at a low rank, but higher ranks will have higher chance): Diamond 5

Skype: Yes, also have teamspeak and can download any other methods if preferred (will give skype details in PM if accepted)
First Name: James
Preferred Role: Jungle, but and can support extremely well too if needed to sub
Champions Played In Said Role: Soloq i play a lot of nid/rengar etc. (carry-type junglers), but in a serious team game i am heavily practiced on champs like reksai, gragas, Jarvan, Elise, Zac,  Udyr. Can flex to alternate jungle options i pick up junglers extremely easy
How can I trust you to be dedicated: Iv been trying for months to look for serious ranked teams to look for high level player and to be seen on the pro scene, and i feel like soloq can be a lot harder to achieve it with. I am confident with a strong team i can carry that far , i have just struggled to find enough committed players with high enough skill capacity to play with. The description you've given to apply for is well put so i can clearly see this is a hard working team that i would be joining so im willing to play as many hours as needed to get to the top

Summoner ID: mlg JONO 
Current rank: promos to plat 4
highest rank this season: plat 3
Age (Doesn't matter a single ounce, but you can't be 11 and play for us, 13+ is good): 19 years old.
Skype: Yes, also have ts and cv.
First Name: Jonathan
Preferred Role: Jungle and Mid or Top Sub
Champions Played In Said Role: main Junglers include elise, lee sin, gragas, ekko and rek sai. Mid laners include viktor, zed, ahri, annie, azir(still mastering).
How can I trust you to be dedicated:
I'm looking for team mates who share the same passion and dedication towards the game as I do. I'm always looking for ways I could improve my play and becoming a professional is a serious goal and mindset of mine. I am willing to but the effort and hard work into all assets of achieving my goal, through strong teamwork, hours of consistent practise and always willing to learn and adapt to new things. I have had previous experience in university grade league of legends tournaments including competing in the QUT Lcs Autum split, and both the Oce university championships this year. I have had a taste for the competitive scene and it is really inspiring me to take it to the next level. During the QUT Lcs Autum split I played as a jungler and then competed as a top laner for both the Oce university championships. I'm currently taking it within myself to learn mid lane champions and to be a really diverse player. I believe I can perform in each jungle and in mid, but i would say im a more confident jungler. I would love the opportunity to be considered and i believe that i would be a huge advantage for any team to have. 

As for hours im available; all weekend pretty much every weekend, and most nights throughout the week. 

Thank you for your time and I hope to be in touch with you soon:)
